trans-unit.source: Indicates that a public field or property represents an XML element when the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializes or deserializes the object that contains it.
trans-unit.target: 指示公共字段或属性在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 序列化或反序列化包含它们的对象时表示 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes or deserializes an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>属于一系列属性，用于控制如何<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化或反序列化对象。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 类似的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: An XML document usually contains XML elements, each of which consists of three parts: an opening tag with possible attributes, a closing tag, and the data between the tags.
trans-unit.target: XML 文档通常包含 XML 元素，其中每个包含三个部分： 带有可能的特性的开始标记、 结束标记和标记之间的数据。

trans-unit.source: XML tags can be nested--that is, the data between tags can also be XML elements.
trans-unit.target: XML 标记可以嵌套的即，标记之间的数据也可以是 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: This capacity of one element to enclose another allows the document to contain hierarchies of data.
trans-unit.target: 包含另一个元素的容量使文档能够包含的数据层次结构。

trans-unit.source: An XML element can also include attributes.
trans-unit.target: 一个 XML 元素还可以包括属性。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to public fields or public read/write properties to control characteristics of the XML elements such as the element name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>到公用字段或公共读/写属性来控制如元素名称和命名空间的 XML 元素的特征。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> can be applied multiple times to a field that returns an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>可以应用多次于返回的对象数组的字段。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this is to specify (through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A> property) different types that can be inserted into the array.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的目的是指定 (通过<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A>属性) 可以插入到数组的不同类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the array in the following C# code accepts both strings and integers.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的 C# 代码中的数组接受字符串和整数。

trans-unit.source: This results in XML that might resemble the following.
trans-unit.target: 这会导致可能如下所示的 XML。

trans-unit.source: Note that when you apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> multiple times without specifying an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> property value, the elements are named after the type of the acceptable objects.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当你将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>多次而无需指定<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>属性值的元素命名的可接受的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to a field or property that returns an array, the items in the array are encoded as a sequence of XML elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>于字段或属性返回一个数组，数组中的项进行编码为 XML 元素的序列。

trans-unit.source: In contrast if an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> is not applied to such a field or property, the items in the array are encoded as a sequence of elements, nested under an element named after the field or property.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>则不会应用于此类字段或属性，该数组中的项被编码为的元素，嵌套在命名的字段或属性的元素序列。

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute> attributes to control how an array is serialized.)
trans-unit.target: (使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>属性来控制如何序列化数组。)

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A> property to specify a type that is derived from the type of the original field or property--that is, the field or property to which you have applied the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A>属性指定的类型，它是派生自的原始的字段或属性--类型、 字段或属性已应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: If a field or property returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, you can apply multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the member.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段或属性返回<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，你可以将应用的多个实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>给的成员。

trans-unit.source: For each instance, set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A> property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个实例，设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A>到一种可以插入到数组的对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the word `XmlElement` in your code instead of the longer <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 word`XmlElement`中你的代码而不是较长<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group` and applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to several of its members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`，并将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>对多个其成员。

trans-unit.source: The field named `Employees` returns an array of `Employee` objects.
trans-unit.target: 名为的字段`Employees`返回的数组`Employee`对象。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> specifies that the resulting XML will not be nested (which is the default behavior of items in an array).
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>指定生成的 XML 将不嵌套的 （这是一个数组中的项的默认行为）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to a class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>类。

trans-unit.source: The XML element name of the serialized member.
trans-unit.target: 序列化成员的 XML 元素名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> class and specifies the name of the XML element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> 类的新实例，并指定 XML 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the member name as the XML element name when serializing a class instance.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>当序列化的类实例的成员名称用作 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, a field named `Vehicle` generates an XML element named `Vehicle`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，名为的字段`Vehicle`生成名为一个 XML 元素`Vehicle`。

trans-unit.source: However if you need a different element, such as `Cars`, pass it in the `elementName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 但是如果你需要一个不同的元素，比如`Cars`，将它传递`elementName`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a simple class that contains a single field named `Vehicles`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示一个简单的类包含名为的单个字段`Vehicles`。

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the field and includes the `elementName` parameter, thereby instructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to generate XML elements named "Cars" rather than "Vehicles".
trans-unit.target: 该示例将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>给字段并包括`elementName`参数，从而指示<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>生成 XML 元素名"汽车"为而不是"车辆"。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of an object derived from the member's type.
trans-unit.target: 从该成员的类型派生的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> class and specifies a type for the member to which the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> 类的新实例，并指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> 所应用到的成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: This type is used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> when serializing or deserializing object that contains it.
trans-unit.target: 此类型在序列化或反序列化包含它的对象时由 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the `type` parameter to specify a type that is derived from a base class.
trans-unit.target: 使用`type`参数来指定从基类派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a property named `MyAnimal` returns an `Animal` object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个名为属性`MyAnimal`返回`Animal`对象。

trans-unit.source: You want to enhance the object, so you create a new class named `Mammal` that inherits from the `Animal` class.
trans-unit.target: 你想要增强该对象，因此你创建一个名为的新类`Mammal`继承自`Animal`类。

trans-unit.source: To instruct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to accept the `Mammal` class when it serializes the `MyAnimal` property, pass the <xref:System.Type> of the `Mammal` class to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>接受`Mammal`类在其序列化时`MyAnimal`属性、 传递<xref:System.Type>的`Mammal`给构造函数的类。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra` that contains a single field named `Instruments`, which returns an array of `Instrument` objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Orchestra`，其中包含名为的单个字段`Instruments`，它返回的数组`Instrument`对象。

trans-unit.source: A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class.
trans-unit.target: 名为第二个类`Brass`继承自`Instrument`类。

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the `Instruments` field, and specifies the `Brass` type, allowing the `Instruments` field to accept `Brass` objects.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>到`Instruments`字段，并指定`Brass`类型，从而允许`Instruments`字段以接受`Brass`对象。

trans-unit.source: The example also specifies the name of the XML element by setting the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还指定 XML 元素的名称通过设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The XML element name of the serialized member.
trans-unit.target: 序列化成员的 XML 元素名。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of an object derived from the member's type.
trans-unit.target: 从该成员的类型派生的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> and specifies the name of the XML element and a derived type for the member to which the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> 的新实例，并指定 XML 元素的名称和 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute" /> 应用到的成员的派生类型。

trans-unit.source: This member type is used when the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> serializes the object that contains it.
trans-unit.target: 此成员类型在 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 序列化包含它的对象时使用。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the member name as the XML element name when serializing a class instance.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>当序列化的类实例的成员名称用作 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, a field named `Vehicle` generates an XML element named `Vehicle`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，名为的字段`Vehicle`生成名为一个 XML 元素`Vehicle`。

trans-unit.source: However, if you need a different element, such as `Cars`, pass it in the `elementName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你需要一个不同的元素，比如`Cars`，将它传递`elementName`参数。

trans-unit.source: Use the `type` parameter to specify a type that is derived from a base class.
trans-unit.target: 使用`type`参数来指定从基类派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a property named `MyAnimal` returns an `Animal` object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个名为属性`MyAnimal`返回`Animal`对象。

trans-unit.source: You want to enhance the object, so you create a new class named `Mammal` that inherits from the `Animal` class.
trans-unit.target: 你想要增强该对象，因此你创建一个名为的新类`Mammal`继承自`Animal`类。

trans-unit.source: To instruct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to accept the `Mammal` class when it serializes the `MyAnimal` property, pass the <xref:System.Type> of the `Mammal` class to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>接受`Mammal`类在其序列化时`MyAnimal`属性、 传递<xref:System.Type>的`Mammal`给构造函数的类。

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra` that contains a single field named `Instruments`, which returns an array of `Instrument` objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Orchestra`，其中包含名为的单个字段`Instruments`，它返回的数组`Instrument`对象。

trans-unit.source: A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class.
trans-unit.target: 名为第二个类`Brass`继承自`Instrument`类。

trans-unit.source: The example applies the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the `Instruments` field, and specifies the `Brass` type, allowing the `Instruments` field to accept `Brass` objects.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>到`Instruments`字段，并指定`Brass`类型，从而允许`Instruments`字段以接受`Brass`对象。

trans-unit.source: The example also specifies the name of the XML element by setting the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还指定 XML 元素的名称通过设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML Schema definition (XSD) data type of the XML element generated by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 生成的 XMl 元素的 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: An XML Schema data type, as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".
trans-unit.target: “XML 架构”数据类型，如名为“XML 架构第 2 部分：数据类型”的“万维网联合会”(www.w3.org) 文档中所定义。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their.NET equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了 XML 架构的简单数据类型及其.net 等效项。

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of <xref:System.Byte> structures, and apply a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A> set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构`base64Binary`和`hexBinary`数据类型使用的数组<xref:System.Byte>结构，并应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>与<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A>设置为"base64Binary"或"hexBinary"根据需要。

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the <xref:System.DateTime> type and apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A> set to "date" or "time".
trans-unit.target: XML 架构`time`和`date`数据类型，使用<xref:System.DateTime>键入并应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>与<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A>设置为"日期"或"时间"。

trans-unit.source: For every XML Schema type that is mapped to a string, apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> with its <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A> property set to the XML Schema type.
trans-unit.target: 对于每种 XML 架构类型，映射到一个字符串，将应用于<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>与其<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A>属性设置为 XML 架构类型。

trans-unit.source: It is possible that this can change the serialization format, not only the schema for the member.
trans-unit.target: 很可能这可能会更改的序列化格式，不仅成员的架构。

trans-unit.source: The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types.
trans-unit.target: 因此你必须将其设置完全符合 XML 架构数据类型之一，该属性是区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML Schema attribute.
trans-unit.target: 将二进制数据作为 XML 传递元素是比将其传递为一个 XML 架构属性更高效。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document named "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".
trans-unit.target: 有关 XML 数据类型的详细信息，请参阅名为"XML 架构第 2： 数据类型"World Wide Web 联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档。

trans-unit.target: XSD 数据类型

trans-unit.target: .NET 数据类型

trans-unit.target: anyURI

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a field named `ExtraInfo`, which returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`，其中包含名为的字段`ExtraInfo`，它将返回<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: The example applies two instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the field and specifies different <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A> values for each instance.
trans-unit.target: 该示例将应用的两个实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>给字段并指定不同<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.DataType%2A>每个实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Each instance enables the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize the specified types inserted into the array.
trans-unit.target: 每个实例使<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>要序列化插入到数组的指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The XML Schema data type you have specified cannot be mapped to the.NET data type.
trans-unit.target: 已指定的 XML 架构数据类型无法映射到 .NET 数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the generated XML element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成的 XML 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the generated XML element.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 XML 元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the member identifier.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为成员标识符。

trans-unit.source: Specify an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName%2A> if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the member's identifier.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute.ElementName%2A>如果要生成的 XML 元素，该成员的标识符名称不同的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can set the same <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName%2A> value to more than one class member if the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between the identically named members.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将设置为相同<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName%2A>如果生成的 XML 文档使用 XML 命名空间来区分具有相同名称的成员对多个类成员值。

trans-unit.source: For details on how to use namespaces and prefixed names in the XML document, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何在 XML 文档中使用命名空间和前缀的名称的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>为新值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element is qualified.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示元素是否是限定的。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Form%2A> property determines whether an XML element is qualified or unqualified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Form%2A>属性确定是否限定或非限定 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Form%2A> property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) 1999 specification, "Namespaces in XML".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Form%2A>属性符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 1999年规范，"XML 命名空间"。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A> property is set to any value, attempting to set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Form%2A> property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Namespace%2A>属性设置为任何值，尝试设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Form%2A>属性`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置， `XmlSchemaForm.None`，指示<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>检查要确定是否为限定命名空间的 XML 文档的架构。

trans-unit.source: If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified.
trans-unit.target: 如果架构未指定的值的单个元素或属性，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>使用`elementFormDefault`和`attributeFormDefault`值以确定是否为限定元素或属性。

trans-unit.source: The following XML code shows a schema:
trans-unit.target: 下面的 XML 代码演示一个架构：

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> reads the schema, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Form%2A> value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>读取架构，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute.Form%2A>值都`Name`和`Number`是`XmlSchemaForm.None`，但`Name`将限定元素而时`Number`元素是非限定。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Form%2A> property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Form%2A>属性`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> must serialize a member that is set to <see langword="null" /> as an empty tag with the <see langword="xsi:nil" /> attribute set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 是否必须将设置为 <see langword="null" /> 的成员序列化为 <see langword="xsi:nil" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" /> 的空标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> generates the <see langword="xsi:nil" /> attribute; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 生成 <see langword="true" /> 属性，则为 <see langword="xsi:nil" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing.
trans-unit.target: 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档以显式指示缺少元素的内容时。

trans-unit.source: Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此类元素包含属性`xsi:nil`设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification, "XML Schema Part 1: Structures".
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 规范中，"XML 架构第 1 部分： 结构"。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property is set to `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>属性设置为`true`、`xsi:nil`属性为已设置为的类成员生成`null`。

trans-unit.source: For example if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates the following XML code.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置名为的字段`MyStringArray`到`null`、<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>生成以下 XML 代码。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property is `false`, no XML element is generated for class members that have been set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>属性是`false`，为已设置为的类成员会生成任何 XML 元素`null`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`.
trans-unit.target: 不能将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>指向成员的属性类型为值类型，因为值类型不能包含`null`。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot set this property to `false` for nullable value types.
trans-unit.target: 此外，不能将此属性设置为`false`为可以为 null 的值类型。

trans-unit.source: When such types are `null`, they will be serialized by setting `xsi:nil` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当这样的类型为`null`，它们会通过设置序列化`xsi:nil`到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a field with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> applied to it, and the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示具有字段<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>应用于该对象与<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace assigned to the XML element that results when the class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分配给 XML 元素的命名空间，这些 XML 元素是在序列化类时得到的。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the XML element.
trans-unit.target: XML 元素的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace%2A> property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification, "Namespaces in XML".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute.Namespace%2A>属性符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 规范，"XML 命名空间"。

trans-unit.source: To create namespaces that are associated with a prefix, you must create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces> that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建与前缀关联的命名空间，必须创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>，包含的命名空间和前缀的 XML 文档中使用。

trans-unit.source: As you set the namespace for each <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, it must match one of the namespaces in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>.
trans-unit.target: 为每个设置命名空间<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>，它必须匹配中的命名空间之一<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerNamespaces>。

trans-unit.source: When the XML is generated, each array is correctly prefixed with the prefix associated with the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: 当生成 XML 时，每个数组是正确加上与指定的命名空间关联的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the explicit order in which the elements are serialized or deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置序列化或反序列化元素的显式顺序。

trans-unit.source: The order of the code generation.
trans-unit.target: 代码生成的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions.GenerateOrder> enumeration to instruct the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> to generate code that sets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Order%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions.GenerateOrder>枚举，以指示<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>生成设置的代码<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Order%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Order%2A> property has been used on one public property or field in a type, it must be applied to all public properties and fields for that type and all inherited types.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Order%2A>已被属性使用一个公共属性或类型中的字段上，必须应用到所有公共属性和该类型以及所有继承的类型的字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object type used to represent the XML element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于表示 XML 元素的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the member.
trans-unit.target: 成员的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A> property to specify a derived type for a field or property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A>属性指定的字段或属性的派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: If a field or property returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, you can apply multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the member.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段或属性返回<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，你可以将应用的多个实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>给的成员。

trans-unit.source: For each instance, set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A> property to a type of object that can be inserted into the array.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个实例，设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A>到一种可以插入到数组的对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A> property to specify a derived object for an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Type%2A>属性指定的派生的对象<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The example also applies three instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to a field that returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还将应用的三个实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>到返回的字段<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: Each instance specifies a type allowed in the field.
trans-unit.target: 每个实例指定字段中允许的类型。
